name: Present Quest
description:
This is my entry for Adventuron's Christmas Jam.

It's my first jam. It's my first itch.io game. It's my first pixel art game.

The submission date is December 20th, and I am doing beta testing now!

FOR BETA TESTERS:

Please type TSTART to start a transcript of the game. 

Type TSTOP to end the transcript. A text file will be generated and you can send it to me over discord! Thank you!

Special Thank You to my Beta Testers:
Manpans, Ekko, Leezet, Shannon, Darren, Melissa, Tammy Dorn, Philip, Myra, Lee-Fay, Tim, Sarah, Michelle, Yacine, Melinda, Chris Ainsley, Farlander, Amanda Dupuy, Randy, Kelley, Richard, and Egnor.
